title: Analysis of Online Higher Education Student Engagement Factors and Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Higher education course attendance experience, basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Research on student engagement strategies due to increased online education demand post-COVID. Explores online learning design principles through offline classes in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four core factors (technological, psychological, behavioral, learning experience design) influencing student engagement in online learning environments.
Learners can interpret comparative analyses of engagement factors from student/instructor perspectives.
Learners can design and propose strategies to improve engagement through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
